Create a materialize node.

Create a materialize node.

materialize_node(source, ...,
  outgoing_table_name = mk_tmp_name_source("mout")(), overwrite = TRUE,
  temporary = TRUE)

Arguments

source

incoming source (relop node or data.frame).
...

force later arguments to be by name
outgoing_table_name

character, name of table to write.
overwrite

logical, if TRUE overwrite tables
temporary

logical, if TRUE use temporary tables

Value

rsummary node

Examples


 d <- data.frame(p= c(TRUE, FALSE, NA),
                 s= NA,
                 w= 1:3,
                 x= c(NA,2,3),
                 y= factor(c(3,5,NA)),
                 z= c('a',NA,'a'),
                 stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
 db <- DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), ":memory:")
 RSQLite::initExtension(db)
 DBI::dbWriteTable(db, "dRemote", d,
                   overwrite = TRUE,
                   temporary = TRUE)

 ops <- dbi_table(db, "dRemote") %.>%
   extend_nse(., v := ifelse(x>2, "x", "y")) %.>%
   materialize_node(., outgoing_table_name = "intermediate") %.>%
   extend_nse(., v2 := ifelse(x>2, "x", "y"))
 cat(format(ops))
#> table('dRemote') %.>%
#>  extend(.,
#>   v := ifelse(x > 2, "x", "y")) %.>%
#>  non_sql_node(., materialize_node(., intermediate)) %.>%
#>  extend(.,
#>   v2 := ifelse(x > 2, "x", "y"))

 to_sql(ops, db)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] "CREATE  TABLE `intermediate` AS   SELECT\n   `p`,\n   `s`,\n   `w`,\n   `x`,\n   `y`,\n   `z`,\n   ( CASE WHEN ( `x` > 2 ) THEN ( 'x' ) ELSE ( 'y' ) END )  AS `v`\n  FROM (\n   SELECT\n    `dRemote`.`p`,\n    `dRemote`.`s`,\n    `dRemote`.`w`,\n    `dRemote`.`x`,\n    `dRemote`.`y`,\n    `dRemote`.`z`\n   FROM\n    `dRemote`\n   ) tsql_85623370025207740752_0000000000"
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] "SELECT\n `p`,\n `s`,\n `v`,\n `w`,\n `x`,\n `y`,\n `z`,\n ( CASE WHEN ( `x` > 2 ) THEN ( 'x' ) ELSE ( 'y' ) END )  AS `v2`\nFROM (\n  SELECT\n   `intermediate`.`p`,\n   `intermediate`.`s`,\n   `intermediate`.`v`,\n   `intermediate`.`w`,\n   `intermediate`.`x`,\n   `intermediate`.`y`,\n   `intermediate`.`z`\n  FROM\n   `intermediate`\n ) tsql_85623370025207740752_0000000001\n"
#> 

 reshdl <- materialize(ops, db)
 DBI::dbGetQuery(db, to_sql(reshdl, db))
#>    p  s v w  x    y    z v2
#> 1  1 NA y 1 NA    3    a  y
#> 2  0 NA y 2  2    5 <NA>  y
#> 3 NA NA x 3  3 <NA>    a  x

 DBI::dbGetQuery(db, "SELECT * FROM intermediate")
#>    p  s w  x    y    z v
#> 1  1 NA 1 NA    3    a y
#> 2  0 NA 2  2    5 <NA> y
#> 3 NA NA 3  3 <NA>    a x

 DBI::dbDisconnect(db)
